abstract: New York State Senate confirms Thomas F Prendergast as chairman of Metropolitan Transportation Authority at confirmation hearing; Prendergast uses opportunity to make case for why organization needs more money from state for five-year capital plan.
lead_paragraph: At his confirmation hearing on Wednesday, Thomas F. Prendergast made the case for more money from the state for the Metropolitan Transportation Authority.

headline.main: State Senate Confirms Prendergast for New Term as M.T.A. Leader
headline.print_headline: State Senate Confirms Transit Authority Leader

snippet: At his confirmation hearing on Wednesday, Thomas F. Prendergast made the case for more money from the state for the Metropolitan Transportation Authority.
